TypeSignature.Value: public struct Nullable<T> where T : struct
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Nullable`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic value class Nullable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 泛型类型的基础值类型。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: 表示可分配有 的值类型。

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以为类型赋值或赋值`null`, 则可以为 null, 这意味着类型没有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 默认情况下, 所有引用类型 (如) 都可以为 null, 但所有值类型 ( 如) 都不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 在C#和 Visual Basic 中, 通过在值类型后使用`?`表示法, 将值类型标记为可以为 null。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如, `int?`在C#或`Integer?`中 Visual Basic 声明可分配`null`的整数值类型。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 此结构支持仅将值类型用作可以为 null 的类型, 因为引用类型在设计上是可以为 null 的。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 类提供对结构的互补支持。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 类支持获取可以为 null 的类型的基础类型, 以及针对其基础值类型不支持泛型比较和相等运算的可以为 null 的类型对的比较和相等运算。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本属性Fundamental Properties 结构的两个基本成员是和属性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果对象的属性为`true`, 则可以使用属性访问对象的值。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果属性为`false`, 则对象的值是未定义的, 尝试访问属性将引发。 If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## 装箱和取消装箱Boxing and Unboxing 如果将可为 null 的类型装箱, 公共语言运行时将自动装箱对象的基础值, 而不是对象本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是说, 如果属性为`true` , 则属性的内容为装箱。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. 如果可以为 null 的类型的基础值为取消装箱, 则公共语言运行时将创建一个新的结构, 该结构已初始化为基础值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果可`HasValue`为 null 的类型的属性`false`为, 则装箱操作的结果为`null`。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此, 如果将一个装箱的可以为 null 的类型传递给需要对象参数的方法, 则该方法必须准备好处理参数为`null`的情况。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 如果`null`取消装箱到可为 null 的类型, 公共语言运行时将创建一个新的`HasValue`结构, `false`并将其属性初始化为。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]和 Windows 运行时组件and Windows Runtime Components 从开始 , 可以将类型包含为在 WinMD 库中导出的结构的成员。 [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 以前, 此操作不受支持。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了 Microsoft Pubs 示例数据库中表的三行。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 该表包含两个不可为 null 的列和两个可以为 null 的列。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. [!code-cpp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 属性为`false` (与属性不同,后者引发异常),该方法也会返回一个值。The method returns a value even if the property is `false` (unlike the property, which throws an exception). 如果属性为`false`, 则该方法将返回基础类型的默认值。 [](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md) If the property is `false`, the method returns the [default](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default-values-table.md) value of the underlying type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索对象的值 (如果定义了该值); 否则, 它将检索默认值或特定的默认值。The following code example retrieves the value of a object if that value is defined; otherwise, it retrieves the default value or a specific default value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`true`, 则可以通过属性访问当前对象的值。 If the property is `true`, the value of the current object can be accessed with the property. 否则, 尝试访问其值会引发异常。Otherwise, attempting to access its value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)`位于 Visual Basic) 对象的属性来确定它是否应显示对象的属性或其属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此运算符支持从当前实例到类型`T`(的类型) 的显式转换。This operator supports the explicit conversion of the current instance to type `T`, the type of . 此类显式转换的语法依赖于语言。The syntax for such explicit conversions is language-dependent. 您还可以通过调用方法来执行转换。You may also be able to perform the conversion by calling the method. 此运算符的等效方法是The equivalent method for this operator is ## Examples 运算符可实现如下所示的代码, `Nullable(Of Int32)`将值转换为值。 The operator enables code such as the following, which converts a `Nullable(Of Int32)` value to an value. [!code-csharp[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/cs/explicit1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Nullable~1.Conversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullable~1.conversion/vb/explicit1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value` `true`如果参数不`null`为, 则将新值的属性初始化为参数, 并将属性初始化为。 `value`If the `value` parameter is not `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the `value` parameter and the property is initialized to `true`. `null` 如果参数为, `false`则将新值的属性初始化为默认值,该值是全部为二进制零的值,并且将属性初始化为 `value`.If the `value` parameter is `null`, the property of the new value is initialized to the default value, which is the value that is all binary zeroes, and the property is initialized to `false`. 此运算符的等效方法是The equivalent method for this operator is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未`T`将类型的值分配给对象, `null`则可以将其与属性进行比较, 并检索其属性, 但不能访问其属性或调用其其他成员。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)`位于 Visual Basic) 对象的属性来确定它是否应显示对象的属性或其属性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` (`Nullable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
